allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path ''D:\\github_repository\\linkedin-jobs-search'' -Recurse -Force | Select-Object FullName, PSIsContainer | Sort-Object FullName | ForEach-Object { $path = $_FullName; $indent = \($path -split ''\\'' | Measure-Object\).Count - 5; $name = Split-Path -Leaf $path; Write-Host \(\(''  '' * $indent\) + \(if \($_PSIsContainer\) { ''[+] '' } else { ''[-] '' }\) + $name\) }")
